story: Kharagpur Data Analytics Group shared a post.
message: Kharagpur Data Analytics Group shared a post. Problem statement has been launched. "Data Tussle" - The '6' day Data Analytics Hackathon organized by Samudramanthan, IIT Kharagpur in association with Kharagpur Data Analytics Group , Scorpio Group and Shoft Shipyard. Code, Upload , Repeat. Prizes worth ₹15,000. Register at : https://tinyurl.com/sm2019reg Visit : samudramanthan.co.in/2019/ https://www.kaggle.com/c/iitkgpsmd #SM2019 #KDAG #Scorpio #Shoft_Shipyard #Data #Analytics #Hackathon

Prove your data analytics skills here. Register at : https://tinyurl.com/sm2019reg Visit : samudramanthan.co.in/2019/ Prizes worth ₹15,000/- The challenge begins on 10 March 2019. #SM2019 #Scorpio #Shoft #KDAG #Data #Analytics #11th_Edition

Flipkart's Campus Engineering Challenge GRID is LIVE ... with this years theme being Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Up for grabs are great prizes, opportunities to work with Flipkart as an Intern or Full time and a unique opportunity to work on an AI/ML problem with a live dataset from Flipkart. There is no branch eligibility criteria.

Visit www.flipkartgrid.com to Register and Decode the Grid!

2nd/3rd year interested in joining KDAG!
Here is an opportunity to showcase you data science skills and become part of KDAG.
We have hosted a competition on KAGGLE where top scorer will get direct interview opportunity.
link:  https://www.kaggle.com/c/kdag2.

Note:Plagiarism will lead to direct disqualification

All the best!

story: Kharagpur Data Analytics Group shared their post.
message: Kharagpur Data Analytics Group shared their post. Interested in Machine Learning and Data Analytics? Kharagpur Data Analytics Group(KDAG) is hiring UG 2nd, 3rd years & PG 1st years. KDAG is a student driven research group solving industrial problem statements in machine learning. Fill out the google form. Link is given below. https://tinyurl.com/yc6rqa9y Registrations open till 6th November,2018 .

This is to announce that very soon Henry Harvin will be starting  workshop in our campus tentatively dates will be from 1st to 4th Nov,18 (as per students availability).So dont miss this chance to enroll yourself and distinguish your profile with global credential of 'Certified Business Analytics Practitioner' and showcase expertise by using the Hallmark of CBAP next to your name. (Ex.Rahul Sharma CBAP).

Actual fees : INR 15000
Fees for IIT KGP Students : INR 5000 ( Subsidized )
Deadline for Registration : 29th October,2018

Please find below the registration steps which the students may follow :-  

Option 1.

Online via Credit Card/Debit Card/Net Banking/Cash Card/Mobile Payments/Wallet

It can be collected by obeying the following steps:-

Step No.1: Go to this link  http://www.henryharvin.com/

Step No.2: Navigate to Courses > Business Analytics> or Click Here 

Step No.3: Navigate to 'On Campus' in the calendar

Step No.4: Follow the payment steps and reach the final page wherein you enter coupon code:IITKGP5000

Step No.5: Click on "Apply" (Price will revise to 5000)

Step No.6: Enter your details and Make the payment through the desirable mode

Step No.7: You will receive an order no. via sms and email. Share that with Coordinator.

Option 2.

Payu Money Link

Link - https://www.payumoney.com/store/buy/iit-kgp-certified-business-analytics-practitioner-course125

Option 3.

Bank Deposit/NEFT :-

In this case, you need to deposit the money in the company's bank account or do NEFT. Details are as under:-

Pay To 

Henry Harvin India Education LLP

Bank Name

State Bank of India

Account Type

Current

Account Number

36195874004

Branch

Sec-19, Noida

Branch City

Noida

IFSC Code

SBIN0011859

Note : We have our spoc in campus who will coordinate for all other announcement,seminar hall booking, they will be in touch and will update the same to all.

For any further query, please contact

Akhil Singh
Asst. Manager
IVR : +919015266266
Mobile: +91-9990371188
Henry Harvin® Education
Pinnacle Business Tower
Building No.B-9
5th Floor, Sector-3
Noida-201301 (UP)
Tel +91 (0)9015266266

*Rahul Sharma(CBAP)*- Want to have similar Hallmark of CBAP next to your name ?

Do you want to become a Data Driven Decision Making Professional ??

Certified Business Analytics Practitioner Program for IIT Kharagpur students by Henry Harvin Education.

This is a 4-days/32-hours Training and Certification Program that equips professionals to Explore+Analyze+Solve Business Problems using R. This enables students to understand analytics-based decision making to drive company’s ROI 

It is very popular in IIM's for its learning while doing teaching style. It surely helps in improving your CV, adding new skill set. Thus, better placements. 

The course fee will be 5000 INR.

Interested ? Fill the google form below
  
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1ho5z-VRYEG_teexGymjzw2DVfttjEMGbvZElBm2kOdI/edit#
           
Deadline: 27th Sept 2018, 4:00pm

Summer internship @ India's fastest growing FinTech Startup
FinBox is a digital lending software company founded by KGP alumni looking for interns interested in Backend/ Frontend Web development and design

What does FinBox do?

FinBox enables lenders - Banks & NBFCs digitise their user journey and process applications online. We have a wide range of products such as:

Web & mobile frontend
Android SDK for capturing phone data for underwriting
Deep learning API suite for 
OCR
Identity Recognition
Text parsing from unstructured data sources like SMS & Email
Big Data Products
Geospatial Data analysis
Fraud detection suite
ML based loan underwriting suite

Their stack is AWS, Django, PostGres, Tensorflow, ReactJS, Airflow with some micro services in GoLang.

Angel List Profile https://angel.co/finbox-in

Open Positions

Junior Front End Engineer - Experience with ReactJS, HTML, CSS required. Brownie points if you can design well
Junior Back End Engineer - Experience in Python required. Familiarity with any web framework like Django or Flask would be valuable
Junior Android Engineer - Experience in android development required
Junior Data Analyst - Experience in Python required

Location

Bangalore 

Contact

Send your resumes/ GitHub profile to 
srijan@finbox.in, 
nikhil@finbox.in

Their stack is AWS, Django, PostGres, Tensorflow, ReactJS, Airflow with some micro services in GoLang.

Angel List Profile https://angel.co/finbox-in

Open Positions

Junior Front End Engineer - Experience with ReactJS, HTML, CSS required. Brownie points if you can design well
Junior Back End Engineer - Experience in Python required. Familiarity with any web framework like Django or Flask would be valuable
Junior Android Engineer - Experience in android development required
Junior Data Analyst - Experience in Python required

Follow our works and updates on 
WordPress at https://iitkgpdag.wordpress.com/ 
Medium at https://medium.com/@iitkdag/

message:
Team “Regressor” Shivam Agarwal and Kanav Anand from IIT Kharagpur has made it into the top 30 finalists of International Data Analytics Olympiad 2018. They are representing India in the final round at Moscow and will be competing against teams from 8 different countries. 
We congratulate and wish best of luck to the team Regressor on behalf of KDAG.

We congratulate and wish best of luck to the team Regressor on behalf of KDAG.

Hello KGP. Here is a beginner's guide to the field of Machine Learning and Data Analytics.

Here are few of the resources for learning and implementations :
1. Machine Learning by Andrew Ng - https://www.coursera.org/learn/machine-learning
2. The Analytics Edge - edX - https://www.edx.org/course/analytics-edge-mitx-15-071x-3
3. Python for Machine Learning - Udemy - https://www.udemy.com/data-science-and-machine-learning-with-python-hands-on/ (Can see preview for free)
4. Deep Learning - https://www.coursera.org/specializations/deep-learning
5. An introduction to statistical learning in R-ISLR - https://github.com/tpn/pdfs/blob/master/An%20Introduction%20To%20Statistical%20Learning%20with%20Applications%20in%20R%20(ISLR%20Sixth%20Printing).pdf
6. Machine learning by Yaser Abu Mostafa cs-156 - A little math intensive.

P.S: 2nd & 3rd year UG students interested to join KDAG for this academic year can solve the following problem statement and send their report in Ipython Notebook/R Markdown to iitkdag@gmail.com by 31st Dec 2017.
https://www.kaggle.com/c/15-071x-the-analytics-edge-competition-spring-2015#description

Dataset can be downloaded from this link: https://tinyurl.com/dataset-NYT

story: Kharagpur Data Analytics Group added an event.
message:
KDAG is organizing a workshop in association with Two Roads Tech Solutions, which is also looking to hire KGPians for entry-level roles. This will also be a chance to interact with the industry experts and get an insight into Quantitative Finance. You will get to learn about how finance interacts with technology and how the industry of this umbrella is evolving.
Date: 06:30PM
Time: 03-11-2017
Veunu: V3, Vikramshila

KDAG is organizing a workshop in association with Two Roads Tech Solutions, which is also looking to hire KGPians for entry-level roles. This will also be a chance to interact with the industry experts and get an insight into Quantitative Finance. You will get to learn about the interaction of finance with technology and how the industry of this umbrella is evolving.
Interested students should fill up this form: https://goo.gl/forms/CSR387qpstqYxbLx1

06.30 PM | V3 | 3rd November
See you all there!

For any query, call/ ping:
Vyom Shrivastava, 8609266433
Raj Anand, 9933911030

Interested in Machine Learning and Data Analytics? 

Kharagpur Data Analytics Group(KDAG) is hiring UG 2nd, 3rd years & PG 1st years.

KDAG is a student driven research group solving industrial problem statements in machine learning.

Fill out the google form. Link is given below. 
http://tinyurl.com/KDAG17-18

Registrations open till 27th October, 2017(Friday).

Interested in Machine Learning and Data Analytics? 

Kharagpur Data Analytics Group(KDAG) is hiring UG 2nd, 3rd years & PG 1st years.

KDAG is a student driven research group solving industrial problem statements in machine learning.

Fill out the google form. Link is given below. 
http://tinyurl.com/KDAG17-18

Registrations open till 27th October, 2017(Friday).
Thanks for attending the Analyse This workshop. You can find the code sample at https://github.com/K-DAG/analyzeThis
Thanks for attending the Analyse This workshop. You can find the code sample at https://github.com/K-DAG/analyzeThis

If you are an aspiring data analyst, we invite you to join us tomorrow at SN Bose Auditorium from 6 - 7 p.m. We will solve the problem statement of Analyze This and help you with your first submission. We will guide you through the basics of data pre-processing, feature engineering, model deployment and testing. Bring your laptops with ipython notebook installed.

If you are an aspiring data analyst, we invite you to join us tomorrow at SN Bose Auditorium from 6 - 7 p.m. We will solve the problem statement of Analyze This and help you with your first submission. We will guide you through the basics of data pre-processing, feature engineering, model deployment and testing. Bring your laptops with ipython notebook installed.
If you like machine learning and free pizzas do come to V4, Vikramshilla. We are waiting for you !
If you like machine learning and free pizzas do come to V4, Vikramshilla. We are waiting for you !
